title: Game crush when loading into a game
body: When I load into a game my game won't load it show a blank screen when I get to client it said  "Game crash" so I reconnect but it still so a blank screen and the same thing keeps happening.

replies.body: By game crash, do you mean a bugsplat?  What does the error say exactly?  With some more details, I may be able to help!
No bugsplat When I load in poro game it show black screen and a error show it That the game crash and I try to reconnect but same thing still happen. Idk what is wrong is it my computer or something.

Thanks for the info!  It sounds liek something is failing to render the game.  It could be a bad driver, game file, or something else.  Go through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  Test it out in custom games as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!
